DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate whether timolol hemihydrate comfortable upon instillation timolol maleate sorbate . This observational study . Subjects open-angle glaucoma ocular hypertension ask complete survey regard normal treatment . No treatment prescribe .
DOC.brief_title: A Comfort Survey Open-angle Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension Patients Treated With 2 Drugs
